product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Wallaby Toiletry Kit
long_description: The popular Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Wallaby Toiletry Kit has plenty of pockets for your personal care items, and is now updated with a removable 3-1-1 pouch for TSA checkpoint convenience. Includes a removable clear, quart-sized 3-1-1 pouch and shatter-proof mirror. Stow-away swivel hook for hanging options; convenient carry handle. 2-way zippered access to main compartment. 2 interior zippered compartments for organization. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Wallaby Toiletry Kit has a stain and water-resistant lining.
short_description: The popular Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Wallaby Toiletry Kit has plenty of pockets for your personal care items, and is now updated with a removable 3-1-1 pouch for TSA checkpoint convenience.
